name: client-side-scripting-project-2
description: Details:	You	are	required	to	create	a	3	or	4	page	website	which	demonstrates	the	capabilities	of	JQuery	plugins	 (or	APIs)	which	should	be	demonstrated	using	jQuery	code	(JavaScript	can	be	included	as	required).	 You	should	also	research	and	use	a	JavaScript	task	runner	in	conjunction	with	your	assignment,	and	ideally,	 store	your	code	on	a	code	repository.
